description: Pubs must keep records of every meal served for 28 days under new legislation to curb Covid-19.
title: Coronavirus: Irish publicans say food receipts law is 'madness'
title_page: Coronavirus: Irish publicans say food receipts law is 'madness' - BBC News
maintext: "We would have people saying to us: 'A business up the road is not using the conditions properly, not using the regulations'," he said.
